body.name: RENPHO Digital Bathroom Scale, Highly Accurate Body Weight Scale with Lighted LED Display, Round Corner Design, 400 lb, Black-Core 1S
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 2 mins
features: Always Accurate: Equipped with 4 high-precision sensors, ensures precise measurements down to a 0.1lb (0.05kg) graduation. With a maximum weight capacity of 400lbs/180 kg, it is a reliable scale for body weight.

Step-On Technology: This digital scale utilizes advanced step-on technology, allowing you to simply step onto the auto-calibrated platform. Within seconds, you will receive precise and instant weight measurements in either pounds or kilograms. Say goodbye to waiting and enjoy the convenience of consistent and accurate readings.

Easy to Use: The clear LED display makes it effortless to read your weight measurements. This body weight scale features convenient functions such as auto-on/off, auto-calibration, low battery indicator, and overload indication.

Designed with Care: This bathroom scales is thoughtfully designed with rounded corners to prevent sharp edges, ensuring safety for all household members. The 5mm tempered glass construction provides exceptional sturdiness, while the sleek surface makes it easy to clean and maintain.

Compact Size: The slim design allows for easy storage, making it a user-friendly weight scales for people. Whether in your bathroom, bedroom, or office, it seamlessly blends into any environment, offering convenience and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This scale was moderately priced, accurate, easily stored and lightweight. The numbers are large, bright and easy to read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but accurate
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for a while, and it's working well. Recently had to go to the doc for the first time in a long time and found that fully dressed weight was about 3.5 lbs more than my weight on this scale that morning. Seems pretty accurate to me. Battery life has been good which was a big problem with my last scale, so I like that. Only down side might be that it's a small platform to stand on. I'm pretty small (5'2" size 6 ladies shoe), so it works for me and fits nicely in a small bathroom, but if your feet are larger, you might have a hard time seeing the numbers. On the other hand, the display remains up for a bit after you step off, so you could read it then if you need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Simple, sleek, does the job. Seems to be accurate and works as it should. Happy overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you are a person of size, pass this one by
reviews.reviewText: The scale is great. Easy to use. It seems accurate. However, I am a person of size and cannot see my weight while standing on it due to my belly being in the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive snd efficient
reviews.reviewText: So far so good it’s been a couple three weeks. It seems pretty accurate. It’s very thin and very delicate. You have to be gentle with that little scale. You can’t throw it around and slam it down and just keep it in a nice corner somewhere and it does pretty well and it’s a nice looking scale too. Very modern looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this scale. My old scale was so clunky but this is compact and very streamlined. I was worried about the glass top but it's secure and sturdy (I am plus size). I thought the white numbers might be difficult to see against the gray background but they are large, crisp and well-lit. Another plus is that the readout holds after you step off the scale (makes it easy to weigh objects that might obscure the display). I checked accuracy against my other scale and they were both spot on. As to longevity, who knows but the price is great and this scale covers all the bases for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars accurate, light wt, easy to read,
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new scale. This one is perfect. easy to read, light weight, seems accurate compared to md scale. I wear womans size 9.5 shoe and fit comfortably on this. if your foot was much larger i then I think you would need a larger one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hey... it works!
reviews.reviewText: When my old reliable scale was stolen (long story).. I needed a new one. Surprisingly, there is a lot of junk scales out there! I had no idea. On the contrary, this scale is very sleek, accurate, easy to use, and priced well. I would recommend this one to anyone in the market, especially if you don't need the fancy fat percentage, BMI, etc. 10/10.

This scale replaces our very old, very large dinosaur of a scale. The new one is perfect. Great price point, lightweight, and easy to read with white numbers on a black background. Comes with batteries. Very accurate.My only issue is when the driver says package was handed to resident when it was just left at the door

Ce l'ho da troppo poco tempo per conoscerne la durata. Sta funzionando benissimo, misura con esattezza il peso, è robusta e sottile e quindi di facile collocamento sotto un mobile del bagno ad esempio. Consiglio quella più grande. Bella esteticamente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 3, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Unauffällige Waage zu einem guten Preis
reviews.reviewText: Neben ihrer Genauigkeit besticht die Waage auch durch ihr stilvolles Design. Das schlanke Profil und das hochwertige Material verleihen meinem Badezimmer eine moderne Note.Die Benutzerfreundlichkeit ist ebenfalls bemerkenswert. Das beleuchtete Display ist gut lesbar, und die Einrichtung war ein Kinderspiel. Außerdem finde ich die automatische Ein- und Ausschaltfunktion äußerst praktisch.Insgesamt kann ich diese Körperwaage nur wärmstens empfehlen. Sie kombiniert Präzision, Stil und Benutzerfreundlichkeit auf herausragende Weise und ist ein unverzichtbares Hilfsmittel für alle, die ihre Gesundheit im Blick behalten möchten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's well made, affordable and offers accurate readings. It is a good size weighing scale and has clear readings. It is a basic weighing scale with stones /pounds and kilos. Batteries were included. Very easy to use. It has a modern and sleek design which will add aesthetic to your bathroom. Just a simple basic scale that looks nice a does its job.
